description: This file defines React custom hooks for pagination and infinite scrolling, specifically usePagination for handling paginated API data fetching with load more and refresh functionalities, and useInfiniteScroll for observing scroll events to trigger actions lazily.

methods.name: usePagination(fetcher, { pageSize = 20, startPage = 1, enabled = true } = {})
methods.description: Hook to paginate through API results with support for load more, refresh, and error handling.

methods.name: useInfiniteScroll(callback, { root = null, rootMargin = '200px', threshold = 0 } = {})
methods.description: Hook to listen to intersection observer events for infinite scroll triggers.

ctags.name: useInfiniteScroll
ctags.pattern: /^export function useInfiniteScroll(callback, { root = null, rootMargin = '200px', threshold = 0 }/

ctags.name: usePagination
ctags.pattern: /^export function usePagination(fetcher, { pageSize = 20, startPage = 1, enabled = true } = {}) {$/
